transArray.content: It's close to the Fourth Ring Road and has few facilities. It's in the area where cars are sold.

Hello dear guest! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and taking your precious time to share your stay experience with us. It is our honor to have a clean and comfortable stay. As you said, the hotel is located in the Badali Automobile Park on the West Fourth Ring Road, next to Mercedes-Benz , Porsche 4S store, the room facilities are complete, but it cannot meet your expectations. We are deeply sorry. Your feedback allows us to see our gaps. All hotel staff will continue to work hard to provide you with a more comfortable stay experience. Thank you. Your support and recognition make all our staff at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel confident on the road ahead and look forward to meeting you every time! I wish you all the best! Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
